item.title: 👎Brian Coddington - Sunshine Disposal & Recycling
item.description: Brian Coddington signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Sunshine Disposal & Recycling.

item.title: ❓Peter Lyon - Washington Department of Ecology, Solid Waste Management Program
item.description: Peter Lyon signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Washington Department of Ecology, Solid Waste Management Program.

item.title: 👎💵Samantha Louderback - Washington Hospitality Association
item.description: Samantha Louderback signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Washington Hospitality Association. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍Hannah Martinez - Indorama Ventures
item.description: Hannah Martinez signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Indorama Ventures.

item.title: 👎💵Jay Balasbas - Basin Disposal and Consolidated Disposal Services Inc.
item.description: Jay Balasbas signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Basin Disposal and Consolidated Disposal Services Inc.. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: ❓💵Mark Johnson - Washington Retail Association
item.description: Mark Johnson signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Washington Retail Association. They are a registered lobbyist.
